item.title: Government shutdown set to become longest ever after latest Senate vote fails
item.description: The latest attempt to end the shutdown, by passing a Republican-backed stopgap resolution through Congress, failed in the Senate for the 14th time.

item.title: NJ governor election: Ciattarelli and Sherrill face off in close race
item.description: The New Jersey governor's race comes amid a government shutdown, a decline in approval for President Donald Trump and national concerns about affordab...

item.description: FTX was one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world when it went bust in 2022. Founder Sam Bankman-Fried is serving a 25-year prison term...

item.title: Trump suggests U.S. won't pay any SNAP benefits during shutdown, contradicting court filing
item.description: Prior presidential administrations have continued paying SNAP benefits during past shutdowns of the U.S. government.

item.title: 2 Massachusetts men have been arrested in the weekend explosion at Harvard Medical School, FBI says
item.description: Two Massachusetts men have been arrested in connection with a weekend explosion at Harvard Medical School, authorities said Tuesday.
